agement •
July 7: Would like position as music director or program director
at educational radio station. Has had 3 years experience as staff
announcer and classical music director. Presently engaged in
staff announcing and board work.
July 8: Lady with Ph.D. in Psychology and Reading would like to
start a program giving developmental reading instruction for both
children and adults. Has had experience with this type of program
in TV before* Presently engaged in directing reading programs for
large corporations*
July 9: Is interested in position as writer-producer, or a pos¬
ition administrative or teaching, relative to either. Hill soon
hold an II.A. in Radio. In addition to journalistic background
and experience, has had three years of commercial radio exper¬
ience and has held present position as an educational radio writ¬
er-producer for the past four years. Would like change because
opportunities for advancement are rather limited*
July 10: Would like a change in the near future. Responsible for
all the duties of a TV producer for the presentation of some 30
past Hoard of Education television programs, in both live and film
form, through the facilities of local commercial stations* Well
experienced in the physical staging aspects of television program
production. This experience has included the responsibility of
scripting, orientation and instruction to the participating per¬
sonnel, and the outside studio rehearsal of the programs. Res¬
ponsibilities also include being available as a consultant and
specialist for all Board of Education departments and persons to
assist them in the preparation and presentation of a television
performance.
